CustomField.description: The no. of seconds took to answer the interaction from the time call entered platform. It accounts for time spent in Menus and other IVR routing call flows. Populated by NiceCXOne integration.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: The no. of seconds took to answer the interaction from the time call entered platform. It accounts for time spent in Menus and other IVR routing call flows. Populated by NiceCXOne integration.
CustomField.label: Speed to Answer
